title: The Shawshank RedempƟon
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redempƟon through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandes oneempire to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp FicƟon
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redempƟon.

title: The Book of Eli
description: The Book of Eli is a 2010 American post-apocalyptic neo-Western action film directed by the Hughes Brothers, written by Gary Whitta

title: Wonderful World
description: Wonderful World is a 2009 dark comedy-drama film written and directed by Joshua Goldin, and starring Matthew Broderick, Sanaa Lathan, Michael K.

title: Waiting for Armageddon
description: Waiting for Armageddon is a 2009 American documentary film that studies Armageddon theology and Christian eschatology.

title: Crazy on the Outside
description: Crazy on the Outside is a 2010 American comedy film starring and directed by Tim Allen. The film marks Allen's feature film directorial debut

title: B*tch Slap
description: Bitch Slap is a 2009 American action film directed by Rick Jacobson and starring Julia Voth, Erin Cummings, America Olivo and Michael Hurst, with cameos by Lucy Lawless.

title: Leap Year
description: Leap Year is a 2010 romantic comedy directed by Anand Tucker and written by Harry Elfont and Deborah Kaplan. Leap Year stars Amy Adams and Matthew Goode.

title: Youth in Revolt
description: Youth in Revolt is a 2009 American romantic comedy-drama film directed by Miguel Arteta and written by Gustin Nash.
